summary:
A qualified, solutions driven, result oriented professional in foreign trade operations and documentation management.
I am a subject matter expert(SME ) and specialist in International Trade (Export/Import) procedures with proven accountability for end to end service delivery and demonstrated excellence in problem solving & managing business operations.

I render a sharp business focus by pivoting & leveraging on my managerial experience in diverse segments ranging from Life Sciences technology, Agro foods, Industrial products (Rubber), General trading and Construction.

SPECIALISATION & CORE FUNCTIONS :
▪ Operations leadership & service excellence 
▪ Relationship Management
▪ General Management/ Administration 
▪ Documentation 
▪ SME
▪ Multi industry exposure
▪ Process Compliance
▪ Internal Communications 
▪ Stakeholder management 
▪ Key Account Management
▪ Regulatory Affairs

currentPositions.description:
Pre- Shipment & Post-Shipment Documentation.
Coordination with factory for dispatch of material as per delivery schedule
Freight negotiation for Air & Sea Shipments
Coordination with CHA for material clearance and shipment status
Keeping track of sea shipment status
Managing other back-end support etc.
Keeping track of dispatch of export documents,
Follow-up for payment with Banks for payment realization on due dates
Keeping track of Bank Realization Certificates
Settling inwards with export trade invoicing and advance payments,
Resolving bank queries,
Tracing L/C, preparation of L/C checklist.
currentPositions.title: Assistant Manager - Foreign Trade

fieldsOfStudy: Logistics, Materials, and Supply Chain Management

educations.schoolName: IMC - Chamber of Commerce and Industry

headline: Assistant Manager at VAV Life Sciences Pvt. Ltd.

message.text: I’m happy to share that I’ve completed my Certificate in Supply Chain Digitization at Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay!
